titles.title: Foreign Travel Accountability Act

To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress semiannual reports on the cost of foreign travel made by employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/26/2013--Introduced. Foreign Travel Accountability Act - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) to report semiannually to the congressional veterans committees on foreign travel made by VA employees while on official business. Requires each report to include the name of each employee and the destination, purpose, duration, and total cost of such travel.
